objects.name: message
objects.string:
Press 'New Game' to start scene1 without loading any previous save
Press 'Load Game' to start scene1 with loading the last save

events.comment: check if player is clicked on new game or load game and store the result inside a global variable. load = 0 means new game, load = 1 means load game

objects.name: message
objects.string:
Click the 'Back' button to go back to main menu.
Click the 'Save' button to save the scene.
Use Left mouse button to drag the characters.

events.comment: Set High Score to be 0 using a global variable and update the text
If player clicked load game in the main menu
load character X,Y information and apply it on to the characters

save X,Y position of characters, each character has it own ID variable which is used in the group section to be able to identify the character when we load the information and apply it on the the character
High Score: as the example got no real gameplay, the high score is increased when a character is dragged
